description: The initiative, led by Kapi Limited, focuses on enhancing food safety in Kenya through the development and distribution of biopesticides. By sourcing natural ingredients from local small-scale farmers, Kapi aims to provide effective, residue-free alternatives to synthetic chemicals. This approach not only supports local agriculture but also promotes safer food for consumers. The initiative emphasizes education and accessibility, ensuring that farmers can make informed choices for sustainable farming practices.
name: Kapi Limited
